name: X-Plane 11 - Add-on: FunnerFlight - Airport Los Angeles International V2
detailed_description:
Los Angeles International Airport is the largest international airport on the U.S. West Coast. It is a major gateway to Europe, Latin America and Asia.

In 2015 KLAX handled nearly 75 million passengers, making it the seventh busiest airport by passenger traffic in the world. By aircraft movements Los Angeles Airport was number 3 in the world busiest airports.

After more than 15 month of hard work FunnerFlight now released KLAX for X-Plane. It’s one of the most detailed custom airport you will find in the X-Plane world.


  • Detailed representation of the airport with all buildings and airport facilities
  • More than 13,000 objects are included
  • ATC taxi routes and 4 runways with Wind rules
  • Over 100 Animations, most using GroundTraffic by Marginal.
  • Dozens of gates with Marginal`s Safegate Docking System
  • About 20 sq mi photo realistic ground textures based on aerial images (0,3m/pixel)
  • X-Plane or ortho-texture terminal taxiway option
  • Day and Night textures

Please install before using the DLC:

  • http://forums.x-plane.org/index.php?/files/file/17888-free-add-on-static-and-animated-aircraft-for-jeffmuellers-payware-kjfk-and-klax/
  • https://www.x-plained.com/aircraft-static-and-animated-library/
  • https://www.opensceneryx.com/

supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • Processor: Multi Core Prozessor with 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphic card with min. 2 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenSceneryX must be installed (Link -> http://www.opensceneryx.com/)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Version 10.6.8 or older
  • Processor: Multi Core Prozessor with 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphic card with min. 2 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenSceneryX must be installed (Link -> http://www.opensceneryx.com/)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04LTS or older
  • Processor: Multi Core Prozessor with 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphic card with min. 2 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenSceneryX must be installed (Link -> http://www.opensceneryx.com/)
